syntaxhighlighter.parser
Class MatchResult

java.lang.Object
  syntaxhighlighter.parser.MatchResult

public class MatchResult
extends java.lang.Object

Matched result, it will be generated when parsing the content.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing

Constructor Detail

MatchResult

protected MatchResult(int offset,
                      int length,
                      java.lang.String styleKey,
                      java.lang.Boolean bold)
Constructor.

Parameters:
offset - the position in the document for this matched result
length - the length of the matched result.
styleKey - the style key for this matched result, cannot be null, see syntaxhighlighter.theme
bold - indicate whether this match should be bolded or not, for details see bold

getStyleKey

public java.lang.String getStyleKey()
The style key for this matched result, see syntaxhighlighter.theme.

Returns:
the style key

isBold

public java.lang.Boolean isBold()
Indicate whether this match should be bolded or not. This will override the 'bold' setting of the style (by styleKey). If it is null, there will be nothing done on the 'bold' of the style.

Returns:
true to bold, false not bold, null means not set (no action to take)

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
